metadata.dc:author: Henry Benítez, M
Gracia Marco, R
Valenciano Pío, R
Morera Fumero, A
Fernández López, L
metadata.dc:description: We present here the preliminary results of the 32-item version of the reactivity to stress questionnaire. The sample consisted of 84 medical students. The mean score was 9.9. There were no sex difference in the total reactivity to stress index score or in any of the subscales.
metadata.dc:title: Descripción del I.R.E.-32 en una población de estudiantes.
[Stress reactivity index-32 in a student population].
metadata.dc:publisher: Actas luso-espanolas de neurologia, psiquiatria y ciencias afines
